name: Vikram Betaal (WIP)
description:
NOTE: The game is not complete yet. You will face an abrupt non-end to the gameplay, along side occasional bugs.  Feel free to let me know what you like so far.

Here is the Source Code.

This is made for the final module project for Game Design & Development diploma at FX School, Mumbai.

A modern retelling of the classic Vikram Betaal stories.

Vikram is a regular office goer, going back home on the last metro home - when he falls asleep and wakes up trapped in the train with the task of bringing Vetaal to moksha.

The writing and dialogues were done by Vedant Pophale @Mythwala on instagram.

CONTROLS:

WASD - move around

Left click - Attack

Space - Block

E- Interact
